description_text:
Team
simsonn





I hope this message reaches you.



I am writing as an affiliate of your program through GoAffPro to request
payment of a pending commission for a sale generated. The details are below:



Order Value: $1,363.29


 Commission: $80.96



 My PayPal account is linked in GoAffPro for payment processing, but for
your convenience, here are the details again: alvaroaponte22548@gmail.com


I request your prompt assistance in processing this payment. If you need
more information, please let me know.



Thank you for your attention and I look forward to your confirmation.



Sincerely,

dayana trujillo

Affiliate Partner

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 10793 中
